body_html:
I'm also having the same/similar errors trying to install from source. My setup:

CPython 3.6.4
IPython 6.2.1

compiler   : GCC 7.2.0
system     : Linux
release    : 4.13.0-32-generic
machine    : x86_64
processor  : x86_64
CPU cores  : 12
interpreter: 64bit

cudatoolkit: 8.0
cudnn: 7.0.5     cuda8.0_0 
magma-cuda80:    2.2.0

error:

../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `cudnnSetConvolutionGroupCount'
../libATen.so.1: undefined reference to `cudnnSetConvolutionMathType'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status

body:
I'm also having the same/similar errors trying to install from source. My setup:

IPython 6.2.1

compiler   : GCC 7.2.0
system     : Linux
release    : 4.13.0-32-generic
machine    : x86_64
processor  : x86_64
CPU cores  : 12
interpreter: 64bit

cudatoolkit: 8.0
cudnn: 7.0.5     cuda8.0_0 
magma-cuda80:    2.2.0

error:
